attributes.action: stop the telephone companies from charging the consumers for the issueing their paper telephone bills to the tune of £1.50 per month
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment everybody gets charge by the telephone companies if they have to issue a 'Paper Bill' but if you have a Computer and are connected to the Internet you can get this bill on line at no charge. What about the 1000s who have not got a Computer, eg our Senior Citizens and those of us who are unemployed to mention a few?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
